projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Latest
projects.description: A selection of my recent work showcasing my skills and expertise.

project1.title: Restaurant Management App (Web)
project1.description: A web application for managing restaurant operations, migrated from a desktop version to Angular and Node.js.
project1.details: This project was developed using Angular and Node.js to migrate a desktop application to a modern web solution.

project2.title: Restaurant Management App (Desktop)
project2.description: A desktop application for managing restaurant operations, built with C# and SQL Server.
project2.details: This project was developed using C# and SQL Server to provide a complete restaurant management solution.

project3.title: Pharmacy Showcase Website
project3.description: A simple showcase website for a pharmacy, highlighting services and contact information.
project3.details: This project was developed to provide essential information and services offered by the pharmacy.

project4.title: School Landing Page
project4.description: A landing page for a school, showcasing its programs, facilities, and contact details.
project4.details: This project was developed to provide information about the school's offerings and contact details.

project5.title: Portfolio Website
project5.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills and projects.
project5.details: This project was developed to highlight my professional journey and the projects I have worked on.

project6.title: Weather App
project6.description: A simple weather application that fetches real-time weather data using an API.
project6.details: This project was developed to provide users with current weather information and forecasts.
